lines.text: Shes steaming her dress, why? Whats up?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I think Chandlers gone.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: He left that.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Tell Monica Im sorry.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Whats up?  Tell Monica Im sorry.  Tell her yourself!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh my God! Chandler just left though!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah but, maybe its not what we think. Maybe its tell Monica Im sorry I drank the last of the milk.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Or maybe he-he was writing to tell her that-that hes changed his name, yknow? Tell Monica Im sorry.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I think it means he freaked out and left!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Dont be so negative! Good God! Isnt it possible that Sorry is sitting in there  right now?!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay. Phoebe, I-I think Ross is right. What are we gonna do?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: LookOkay, Im just gonnaIm gonna have to go find him and bring him back! Okay? You-you make sure Monica does not find out, okay?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay but if you dont find him and bring him back, I am gonna hunt you down and kick your ass!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I will, I will find him.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Hey Joey, could you uh, go through these lines with me?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh man! They-they just redid my make-up!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Just the last two pages.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: All right.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: I found the picture!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Picture? What picture?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Could you uh, could you lower your script? I need to see your face so I can uh, play off your reaction.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Okay uh, look I know youre a great actor, okay? And you play all those Shakespeare guys and stuff

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Oh, thanks.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: But youre spittin all over me man!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well of course I am!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: You know youve been spitting on me?!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Thats what real actors do! Annunciation is the mark of a good actor! And when you enunciate, you spit!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Wow! Didnt know that.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Great!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Thanks! Okay-okay check it out!  Picture? What picture?  Eh?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Gunther have you uh, have you seen Chandler?

lines.speaker: gunther
lines.text: No. No, I havent seen him.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh damn!

lines.speaker: gunther
lines.text: Hes getting married tomorrow right?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yes. Yes. Dont worry. Everythings fine. Well uh, well see you tomorrow at the wedding.

lines.speaker: gunther
lines.text: I wasnt invited.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Well then well-well see you the day after tomorrow.  Mom?! Dad?!  What-what what you guys doing here?!

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: Well you kids talk about this place so much, we thought wed see what all the fuss is about.

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: I certainly see what the girls like coming here.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Why?!

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: The sexy blonde behind the counter.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Gunther?!

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: Your mother just added him to her list.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What? Your-your list?

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: Yeah, the list thatof people were allowed to sleep

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yes! No-no! I know, I know what the list is! Mom! Look if you see Chandler, could you just let him know Im looking for him?

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: And if you see Rita Moreno, let her know Im looking for her.

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: Action!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: I found the picture!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: What picture?!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: The picture of my wife! In your pack!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: You went through my personal property?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Why do have a picture of Paulette in your pack?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Because Vincent, we were lovers.  For two years!

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: Cut! Wonderful!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Great scene yeah?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Oh youre awesome! And, in that last speech? You soaked me.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Thanks a lot.

lines.speaker: the assistant director
lines.text: Heres your call sheet for tomorrow.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh, Im-Im not working tomorrow.

lines.speaker: the assistant director
lines.text: You are now.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No! No! I cant! You gotta get me out of it! Ive got plans!  Important plans!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ross said theres still no word from Chandler.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh but he did say that they found the grandmother wandering down fifth avenue.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay. Well theres one down.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Im getting married today!!!   I think I just cracked a rib. But I dont care because todays my wedding day! My day is finally here!!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yknow she might not even notice hes gone.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Im gonna start getting ready!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: God! DontWe cant let her start getting ready! This is too awful! Oh God, but wait shell be in the gown and then he wont show up and then shes gonna have to take off the gown

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Shhh! Stop it! Stop it Rachel! You cant do this here!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Im sorry. Im sorry. Its just Its just so sad!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah, but youve got to pull yourself together! Monica cant see you like this! Then shell know somethings wrong!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I know. I know. Oh God.  Theres no tissue! Can you grab me some toilet paper?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah.  Oh, thats gone too. This is Monicas bathroom right?!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: No-no! I-I I found one.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh thank you!  Oh God!  Can I have another one?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Sure.  Do you need some floss?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh God I just can not imagine what is gonna happen if Chandler doesnt show up!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh heres a whole bunch.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh, I mean shes gonna be at the wedding waiting for him and people will be whispering, "Oh that poor girl." Yknow? Then shell have to come back here and live all alone.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh my God!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: There was a pregnancy test in the garbage, and its positive. Monicas pregnant.  So I guess she wont be totally alone.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh my God!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I know! Monicas gonna have a baby! Hey, can this count as her something new?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh my God!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Hey, do you think this is why Chandler took off?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No, she had to have just taken that test because I took out the trash last night.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh God, this is turning into the worst wedding day ever! The bride is pregnant. The groom is missing. And Im still holding this.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay Phoebe, we can not tell anyone about this.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Right.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah, okay. Hey, wait. Do you know what kind of birth control she was using?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No. Why?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Just for the future, this is hardly a commercial for it.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Anything?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No! I talked to Joey on the set, he hasnt heard from him. I-I-I talked to Chandlers parents again!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: You told them he was missing?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No! I made it seem like I was just calling to chat. Pretty sure, they both think Im interested in them.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: All right, weve got to tell her hes gone.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No! Hey! Hey! We cant!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ross, shes gonna start getting ready soon!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Well, cant you at least stall her a little? Ill-Ill go back to some of the places I went last night.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: All right, well how much time do you need?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Well how much time before she absolutely has to start getting ready?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: One hour.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Give me two.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Then why do you ask?!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Okay, wish me luck.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay. Im going with you.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Why?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Ross, youre tired. Youve been looking all night. And clearly you suck at this.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: All right, Ill see you guys later.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay. Wait, do you know how youre going to stall her?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ill figure something out.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: All right. Good luck.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Hey! Okay, so I thought wed start with my make up and then do my hair.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay uh, but before you do that. I-I, I need you to talk to me.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: About what?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Umm Im never gonna getting married!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah you will! The right guy is just around the corner! Okay, are we done with that?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No Monica! Im serious! Oh, maybe I should just forget about it. Become a lesbian or something.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Any woman would be lucky to have ya.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well maybe it would make me feel better if I slept with Joey.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Rachel! You okay?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Excuse me, Aaron?  Hi! Umm, I have a little problem with the schedules. Originally, I wasnt supposed to work today, and I have this wedding that I really have to be at. Its my best friends, and Im officiating so I really cant work past four.

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: Joey, you gotta stay until the end. We cant stop filming just for you. Its not like its your wedding.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Im having surgery!

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah, I-I just made up the stuff about the wedding because I didnt want you to worry about me. But, Im having surgery today.

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: What kind of surgery?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Transplant.

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: But youre supposed to work on Monday.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hair transplant.

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: But youre not bald.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Its not on my head.

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: Look Joey, theres nothing I can do. Besides, youre probably gonna be out by four anyway. Weve just got one short scene. Its just you and Richard, and God knows hes a pro. Youll be fine.  Morning Richard.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey! Youre here! Great! Great! Great! Lets get going buddy, weve got a scene to shoot!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Im wearing two belts.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Are you drunk?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: No!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yes you are!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: All right.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: We are never gonna find him! Hes one guy in a huge city!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh my God! Is that him?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: That is an old, Chinese woman!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: He could be in disguise, yknow.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Aw, yknow Yknow, maybe were-were just approaching this all wrong. If youre Chandler and-and you wanna hide, where is the last place on Earth people would think youd go?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: So this is your office?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: How did you guys find me? I knew I shouldve hid at the gym!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: What the hell are you doing?!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Panicking! And using the Internet to try to prove that Im related to Monica. How is she?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Shes fine. She doesnt know youre gone. And she doesnt have to know, okay? Now come on, were going home.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: No! No! No! I cant do that!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Why not?!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Because if I go home, were gonna become the Bings! I cant be the Bings!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Whats wrong with being the Bings?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: The Bings have horrible marriages! They yell. They fight. And they use the pool boy as a pawn in their sexual games!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Chandler, have you ever put on a black cocktail dress and asked me up to your hotel room?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Then you are neither of your parents!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Its not just their marriage! I mean, look at yours. Look at everybodys! The only person that can make marriage work is Paul Newman! And Ive met me; I am not Paul Newman. I dont race cars! I dont make popcorn! None of my proceeds go to charity.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: But look Chandler, right now, no one has a lower opinion of you than I do. But I totally believe you can do this.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I want to. I love her so much, but Im afr Its too huge.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yknow, okay. Youre right. It is huge. So why dont we take it just a little bit at a time? Okay? Umm, forget getting married for a sec; just forget about it. Can you just come home and take a shower?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well yeah, but then

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: YeahNo-but-but-but-but! Were just gonna go home and take a shower. Now, thats not scary right?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Depends on what you mean by we.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: The nights are the hardest.  But then the day comes! And thats every bit as hard as the night. And then the night comes again

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: The days and nights are hard! I get it! Okay? Look umm, Rachel Im sorry! I have to start getting ready! Im getting married today!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I know. At dusk. Thats such a hard time for me.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Im gonna go put my make up on, we have to be at the hotel in an hour!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay. But wait!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Lets go to lunch.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I cant go to lunch!!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Right.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh good God! Ive fallen down!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Whats going on?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay. All right.  Honey listen. When I tell you what Im about to tell you, I need you to remember that we are all here for you and that we love you.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Okay, youre-youre really freaking me out.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: We cant find Chandler s vest. We cant find Chandlers vest.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: How can that be?! Oh wait! Wait! Are you, are you serious?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Found the vest! I mean were gonna have to keep an eye on it, yknow make sure we dont lose it again

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh wow! Okay. Dont scare me like that okay? I mean for a minute there I was like, "Oh my God! The worst has happened!"

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I would sooner die in this hellhole then see her back with you!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: That can be arranged.

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: Lets reset.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: What?! He got me! Owwwwww!!!

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: Lets take it from there.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Are you a little off today? Its going terribly slowly.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Look, my best friends are getting married in like an hour. Okay? And Im the minister. Please! Please! Can you pull it together?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Of course! Im-Im sorry. I-Id hate you to miss anything like that on account of me. I can do this!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you.

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: Still rolling, annnnd action!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I would sooner die in this hellhole then see her back with you!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Now, that can be arranged!  Slippery little bugger!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: So-so you two were married huh? What happened? You just drift apart?

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: Here comes the bride.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh my God Monica!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I wanna wear this everyday.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: You look so beautiful.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Im so happy for me.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hello?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey! Did Chandler show up yet?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah, we got him back. Everythings fine.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Damnit!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: What? Why? Where are you?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Im still on the set!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Joey! The wedding is in less than an hour!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I know! Im sorry! The guys drunk, they wont let me go until we get this.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh my God! Im gonna have to find another minister.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No! No, Im the minister! All right, look-look, put em both on the phone, Ill marry them right now.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ugh! Joey, I have to go.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey! Dont you hang up on me! Ill marry you and me right now! I have the power!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: There you go. You put on a tuxedo! Now that wasnt so scary, was it?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Im telling you, just a little bit at a time.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah okay. Well, whats the next little bit?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Getting married.  Okay. Okay. You can, you can do that too! Just like youve done everything else!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah. Youre right. Hey I-I can do that.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Okay, excuse me for a minute.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: WhHeyWhoa-whoa, where, where you going?!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Ross, I am not gonna run away again! I just want to get a little fresh air.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh fresh air!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Wait! Maybe, maybe youre overreacting! You do that yknow.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well Phoebe, we gotta do something!  Well, yknow. I mean theres no way Joeys gonna make it in time. So Im gonna through the hotel and see if theres any other weddings going on.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay. Oh but dont tell them Monicas pregnant because, they frown on that.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Anastassakis/Papasifakis wedding, excellent! {Its a good thing Jennifer Aniston is Greek, because she had to pronounce those names. Luckily for me, they were written on a sign.} Congratulations.  Mazel Tov!  Hi! Oh, great hat.  Listen umm, I need you to perform another wedding. Can you do that?

lines.speaker: the rabbi
lines.text: I dont know. Are they Greek Orthodox?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah. Theyre theyre-theyre my friends, uh, Monica Stephanopolus and uh, and Chandler Acidofolus.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hi!  Hi!  Hi. Has umm, anyone seen Chandler?

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: I thought he was with you.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: He-he was with me umm, were playing a little game, yknow? Hide and seek.

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: You cant ask us son, thats cheating.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Youre right, thanks for keeping me honest dad.

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: Well, he better not come by here. He cant see the bride in the wedding dress.

lines.speaker: mrs. bing
lines.text: As I recall when we got married, I saw the groom in the wedding dress.

lines.speaker: mr. bing
lines.text: But that was after the wedding, its not bad luck then.

lines.speaker: mrs. bing
lines.text: Honey, it isnt good luck.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh my God! Monica!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I know! Hey, hows Chandler doin?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Great. Hes doing great. Dont you worry about Chandler.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Well, youre-youre sweating.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: These-these are beads of joy.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh thats sweet. Dont touch me.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Uh Phoebe, can I see you for a second?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Whats going on?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Chandlers gone again!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh my God! Why would you play hide and seek with someone you know is a flight risk?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Aaron! You gotta let me go. The guys hammered!

lines.speaker: the director
lines.text: Im sorry Joey, as long as hes here and hes conscious were still shooting.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: You wouldnt happen to have a very big fork?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: So I uh, I just talked to the director. Thats it, were done for the day.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well have we finished the scene?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah! You you were wonderful.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: As were you.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: So I got your car, its right outside.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Why? Are we done for the day?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Thats what you told me.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Oh, thank you. Youre welcome.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No-no-no! We gotta go! Come on!  Here we go.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Is that my ass?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: There he is!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Hey! Oh!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Youre not getting away this time mister! Unless you want that ass kicking we talked about!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Ross!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hiiii-Ya!!  Im serious! Youre not walking out on my sister!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Thats right! Im not!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Then where the hell have you been?!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I know about Monica.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: You know?!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah, I heard you and Rachel talking.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What?! What?! Talking about what?!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: You dont know?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Know whatIf somebody doesnt tell me whats going on right now

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: What? Youll hi-ya?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Monicas pregnant.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh my God. Oh my God! And youre-youre youre not freaking out?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well I was! Then I went down to the gift shop because I was out of cigarettes

lines.speaker: phoebe and ross
lines.text: Cigarettes?!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Big picture please! So I was in the gift shop, and thats when I uh, saw this.  New York.) Yeah, yknow what? I thought anything that can fit into this, cant be scary.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Well you obviously didnt see Chucky 3.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: But come on, look at how cute and small this is! So I got it to give Monica so shed know I was okay.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Dude.

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: Way to go son! I knew youd find him!

lines.speaker: mr. bing
lines.text: Our little boy is getting married.

lines.speaker: mrs. bing
lines.text: Oh look at you! So handsome!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: You look beautiful mom.  You look beautiful too dad. I love you both.  Im so glad you here.

lines.speaker: the rabbi
lines.text: Are you Chandler?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Are you Joey?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Huh. This is nice.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ive never walked down the aisle knowing it cant end in divorce.

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: Oh I wish youre grandmother had lived to see this.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Shes right there.

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: Not that old crow, my mother.  Congratulations darling.

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: I love you sweetheart.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: You look beautiful. Is this new?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Not now.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Who is this?

lines.speaker: the rabbi
lines.text: I am Father Kalebasous.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hes Greek Orthodox.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: As are you

lines.speaker: the rabbi
lines.text: Let us begin. Dearly beloved

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Thats my line!  I can take it from here, thanks.  Dearly beloved, Im sorry Im a little late. You may be confused by this now,  but you wont be Memorial Day weekend 2002. Well, lets get started before the groom takes off again. Huh?  We are gathered here today, to join this man and this woman in the bonds of holy matrimony. Ive known Monica and Chandler for a long time, and I can not imagine two people more perfect for each other. And now, as Ive left my notes in my dressing room. We shall proceed to the vows. Monica?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: He took off?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Go on! Go on.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Chandler, for so long I I wondered if I would ever find my prince, my soul mate. Then three years ago, at another wedding I turned to a friend for comfort. And in stead, I found everything that Id ever been looking for my whole life. And now here we are with our future before us and I only want to spend it with you, my prince, my soul mate, my friend. Unless you dont want to. You go!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Chandler?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: No, thats okay.  Monica I thought this was going to be the most difficult thing I ever gonna had to do. But when I saw you walking down that aisle I realized how simple it was. I love you. Any surprises that come our way its okay, because I will always love you. You are the person I was meant to spend the rest of my life with. You wanna know if Im sure?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: You may not kiss the bride. So, I guess by the powers vested in my by the state of New York and the Internet guys, I now pronounce you husband and wife. Oh wait! Do you take each other?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I do.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I do.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah you do!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Rings?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Aw crap! Okayuh uh lets-lets do the rings.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: We good? Yeah? Good? Once again, I pronounce you husband and wife.  Now kiss her again.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I love you. And I know about the baby.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What baby?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Our baby.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: We have a baby?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Phoebe found your pregnancy test in the trash.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I didnt take a pregnancy test.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Then who did?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh and theyre gonna have a baby.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.speaker: {transcribers note
lines.text: There was no trailer for this episode. See you in season 8; which will start this fall.}
